name: Punch Are Much
description:
Unzip the file with winzip. Then Enjoy by opening the EXE file

Do you Like Boxing ? Then you may enjoy this little Cartoony Boxing Game.

I made this game under 60 Hours for a Game Dev Challenge

*Full Gamepad Controller Support

*No Sound & Music

*Boss Fights Included

*Special Fiery Moves

This game is my inferior version of a Real game made by a True Indie Dev called 'PontyPants' https://store.steampowered.com/app/1512590/Punch_A_Bunch/
